definition: silk/thread/trace/(cuisine) shreds or julienne strips/CL:條|条[tiao2]/classifier: a thread (of cloud, smoke etc), a bit, an iota, a hint (of sth) etc

sentences.english: It's very difficult to climb a sheer cliff.
sentences.chinese: 薄綢是一種極薄的絲綢或人造絲織物。

sentences.english: In the process of producing polyester compound filament fabric, streaky warp is easy to be appeared.
sentences.chinese: 滌綸複合絲織物在生產過程中很容易出現經柳病疵。

sentences.english: Jin represents the highest technical level of the ancient silk fabrics.
sentences.chinese: 在古代絲織物中“錦”是代表最高技術水平的織物。

sentences.english: The Paper also describes rigidity teSts and analyses of various silk fabrics.
sentences.chinese: 文中還對各類絲織物的彎曲剛性進行了測試與分析。

sentences.english: Treats the tussah fabrics with low temperature plasma before dyeing.
sentences.chinese: 應用低溫等離子體對柞絲織物進行染色前處理。
